title: Using the Power Rule
speech: Using the power rule,  the log base 3 of 5, plus the log base 3 of 8, minus the log base 3 of 2 is equal to the log base 3 of 40, minus the log base 3 of 2
pacedSpeech: Using the power rule,   the log base 3 of 5, plus the log base 3 of 8, minus the log base 3 of 2 is equal to the log base 3 of 40, minus the log base 3 of 2

title: Using the Quotient Rule
speech: Using the quotient rule,  the log base 3 of 40, minus the log base 3 of 2 is equal to, the log base 3 of 20
pacedSpeech: Using the quotient rule,   the log base 3 of 40, minus the log base 3 of 2 is equal to, the log base 3 of 20
